name: MathServer
description: Handles arithmetic: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

name: WeatherServer
description: Provides real-time weather data and 7-day forecasts for any city.

name: FinanceServer
description: Retrieves real-time stock prices, currency exchange rates, and crypto data.

name: CRMAgent
description: Manages customer profiles, subscription tiers, and support tickets.

name: EmailServer
description: Automates sending marketing emails and transactional notifications.

name: SlackServer
description: Integrates with Slack workspace to post messages and manage channels.
